Name: Match Match Mania!
About the game: Welcome to the future of competitive sports! Puzzle fans rejoice! Make matches by destroying or swapping gems. Can you make a Mega Match (9)!? Defend your towers from the enemy's ranks. Whether it's KBaM or a controller, your shooting skills will be put to the test. RTS-inspired economy system. Hire peons to mine for bolts. Use bolts to purchase items of increasing power! Research, buy items, and adapt to game-changing events - all in real time . Each match3+ sends a minion down a chosen lane: Top, Bottom, Mid, and Jungle. Keep an eye on your opponent and adapt accordingly! Gem Frenzy Mode. The fastest matcher wins! In Gem Frenzy, don't worry about towers, minions, items, or sniping. Focus on making matches and race to victory! Background on me and the game. Match Match Mania! was inspired by games in the late 90s and early 2000s - Weird ideas mashed together and just going for it. Inspirations include Yoshi's Cookie, Power Stone, Chu Chu Rocket, and much, much more. The game was developed with split-screen, human vs human competitive play in mind. If you don't have anyone at home, try Steam Remote Play to invite a friend!
